UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Rational design of alpha-helical antimicrobial peptides: do's and don'ts.
Literature.Author: Uggerhøj LE, Poulsen TJ, Munk JK, Fredborg M, Sondergaard TE, Frimodt-Moller N, Hansen PR, Wimmer R

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC=3.1µM),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 700221(MIC=1.6µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=3.1µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=12.5µM)
